item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Alison Goldfrapp - Love Invention (Invention Dub), So Hard So Hot / Neverstop (Extended Club) version tracks?
item.description:
I'm looking for the 3 exclusive remixes from The Love Invention Digital Deluxe album (they are too in the green vinyl deluxe limited edition):
• Love Invention (Invention Dub) 6:15
• So Hard So Hot (Extended Club Version) 7:28
• Neverstop (Extended Club Version) 6:52
item.author: ignatius
